languages.text: {n}За мгновение до удара Паскаль прикрывает глаза. Вокс шелестит одну единственную фразу:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".
{n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
languages.original_text: {n}За мгновение до удара Паскаль прикрывает глаза. Вокс шелестит одну единственную фразу:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".

traits.locale_text: {n}A moment before your blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A moment before your blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A moment before you deal a blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが一撃を加える寸前にパスカルは目を閉じる。彼のヴォクスから、ざわめくようなフレーズが聞こえてくる。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切ってください」
languages.original_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが一撃を加える寸前にパスカルは目を閉じる。彼のヴォクスから、ざわめくようなフレーズが聞こえてくる。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切ってください」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡闭上了眼睛，迎接你的攻击。在倒下之前，他的音阵装置中发出了沙沙作响的声音。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡闭上了眼睛，迎接你的攻击。在倒下之前，他的音阵装置中发出了沙沙作响的声音。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Un momento antes de asestar el golpe, Pasqal cierra los ojos. Una sola frase susurrante sale de su voco:{/n} «Que se interrumpa el Ciclo».
languages.original_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un momento antes de asestar el golpe, Pasqal cierra los ojos. Una sola frase susurrante sale de su voco:{/n} «Que se interrumpa el Ciclo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Einen Moment, bevor du ihn triffst, schließt Pasqal die Augen. Eine einzige raschelnde Phrase ertönt aus seinem Vox:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde."
languages.original_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einen Moment, bevor du ihn triffst, schließt Pasqal die Augen. Eine einzige raschelnde Phrase ertönt aus seinem Vox:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Juste avant de recevoir votre coup, Pasqal ferme les yeux et, dans un bruissement, son vox prononce ces quelques mots :{/n} « Que le cycle soit rompu. »
languages.original_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Juste avant de recevoir votre coup, Pasqal ferme les yeux et, dans un bruissement, son vox prononce ces quelques mots :{/n} « Que le cycle soit rompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, darbe kavuşmadan hemen önce gözlerini yumuyor. Voksundan hışırtılı, tek bir ifade çıkıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
languages.original_text: {n}A moment before you deliver the blow, Pasqal closes his eyes. A single rustling phrase comes out of his vox:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Darbenin kavuşmasından hemen önce Pasqal gözlerini yumuyor. Voksundan sadece tek bir hışırtılı cümle çıkıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
